content.rendered:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming a fashionable DIY make-up stylist in the beauty makeup artist’s salon?

Welcome to the DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover, a fascinating beauty salon game, where you can create fun-filled makeovers for pretty girls! You can showcase your skills as a make-up stylist in our salon.

Make use of various tools and facial cleansers to give your model a refreshing skin makeover. There are numerous dress up designs to explore for a flawless make up look!

Use left mouse click to apply cosmetics and change outfit.

Gameplay: DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover

The player’s goal is to become a successful and renowned makeup artist, managing their own DIY makeup salon. They’ll provide various spa treatments and makeup services to clients, earning money and upgrading their salon.

Gameplay Mechanics:

  1. Client Management:
    • Arriving Clients: Clients will arrive at the salon, each with unique requests for spa treatments and makeup styles.
    • Scheduling: Players must schedule appointments for clients, ensuring efficient use of their time and resources.
    • Client Satisfaction: The quality of service provided directly impacts client satisfaction. Happy clients will return and recommend the salon to others.
  2. Spa Treatments:
    • Facial Treatments: Offer deep cleansing, exfoliation, and moisturizing treatments to rejuvenate the skin.
    • Massages: Provide relaxing massages to relieve stress and improve circulation.
    • Hair Treatments: Offer hair washing, conditioning, and styling services.
  3. Makeup Applications:
    • Base Makeup: Apply foundation, concealer, and powder to create a flawless complexion.
    • Eye Makeup: Create various eye looks, including smoky eyes, cat eyes, and natural glam.
    • Lip Makeup: Apply lipstick, lip liner, and gloss to enhance the lips.
  4. Customization:
    • Salon Decor: Players can customize the interior of their salon, choosing furniture, decorations, and color schemes.
    • Makeup Products: A wide variety of makeup products will be available for purchase, allowing players to experiment with different looks and styles.
  5. Leveling Up:
    • Experience Points: Completing services and satisfying clients will earn experience points.
    • Level Progression: As players gain experience, they’ll unlock new treatments, products, and salon upgrades.
  6. Challenges and Events:
    • Seasonal Challenges: Participate in seasonal events with themed makeup looks and rewards.
    • Client Requests: Some clients may have special requests or challenges, requiring players to think creatively and adapt their skills.

In-Game Features:

  • Tutorial System: A guided tutorial will introduce players to the basic gameplay mechanics.
  • Social Features: Allow players to connect with friends, share their creations, and compete in challenges.
  • Achievements and Rewards: Complete specific tasks to unlock achievements and earn rewards.
  • In-App Purchases: Optional in-app purchases can accelerate progress or provide additional content.

By combining engaging gameplay, customization options, and social features, “DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover” can offer a fun and satisfying experience for players who enjoy beauty and creativity.
